body: Hmm... It's not terrible. the use of visual storytelling is pretty well implemented though I feel like I may not want a translation because I am not so sure I want to know what it says. It does however have a very well presented scenario, and I can say that I can appreciate that.

If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't underestimate random people curse
